channel.title: Client stuck at 0%
channel.description:
Okay well I am running a 718 client, used from matrix. And when I run it with the source it gets stuck at 0% when checking for updates. I checked loader.java and everything seems fine.
Edit: got a different client and works fine now. someone please close this.
